title: 157. Why Are Japanese Homes Disposable?
description: In most countries, houses get more valuable over time. In Japan, a new buyer will often bulldoze the home. We'll tell you why.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
content:encoded: In most countries, houses get more valuable over time. In Japan, a new buyer will often bulldoze the home. We'll tell you why.
